013package org.apache.juneau.dto.html5;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
018
019/**
020 * An object that gets serialized as raw XML by the XML and HTML serializers.
021 *
022 * <p>
023 * Can be used to serialize text containing markup without escaping the markup.
024 * For example:
025 *
026 * <h5 class='figure'>Example:</h5>
027 * <p class='bjava'>
028 *    HtmlText <jv>htmlText</jv> = <jk>new</jk> HtmlText(<js>"&lt;span&gt;&amp;#2753;&lt;/span&gt;"</js>);
029 * </p>
030 *
031 * <ul class='seealso'>
032 * </ul>
033 */
034@Xml(format=XMLTEXT)
035public class HtmlText {
036   private final String text;
037
038   /**
039    * Constructor.
040    *
041    * @param text Raw text.
042    */
043   public HtmlText(String text) {
044      this.text = text;
045   }
046
047   @Override
048   public String toString() {
049      return text;
050   }
051}
